channel.title: Clan chat [PI]
channel.description: Okay, well, when I enter a clan and try to say something like "/hey" it doesn't show up. In the client cmd prompt, it says the clan name though. Can anyone help me? I will post any codes that anyone needs to look at.

item.title: Clan chat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

I’d try this, im not sure if it will work or not, but its a try

replace your ClanChat.java with

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.util.Misc;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.Server;
/**

  • Chat
    **/
    public class ClanChat implements PacketType {

    @Override
    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
    String textSent = Misc.longToPlayerName2(c.getInStream().readQWord());
    textSent = textSent.replaceAll("_", " ");
    //c.sendMessage(textSent);
    Server.clanChat.handleClanChat(c, textSent);
    }
    }
    [/code]

and if you don’t have a clanchat.java make 1

Read full topic
